org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns.DNSResourceRecord

  • Packages that use DNSResourceRecord 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns
    DNS server implementation for Gumdrop.

    • Uses of DNSResourceRecord in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static DNSResourceRecord DNSResourceRecord.a​(java.lang.String name, int ttl, java.net.InetAddress address)
      Creates an A record (IPv4 address).
      static DNSResourceRecord DNSResourceRecord.aaaa​(java.lang.String name, int ttl, java.net.InetAddress address)
      Creates an AAAA record (IPv6 address).
      static DNSResourceRecord DNSResourceRecord.cname​(java.lang.String name, int ttl, java.lang.String canonicalName)
      Creates a CNAME record.
      static DNSResourceRecord DNSResourceRecord.mx​(java.lang.String name, int ttl, int preference, java.lang.String exchange)
      Creates an MX record.
      static DNSResourceRecord DNSResourceRecord.ns​(java.lang.String name, int ttl, java.lang.String nsName)
      Creates an NS record.
      static DNSResourceRecord DNSResourceRecord.ptr​(java.lang.String name, int ttl, java.lang.String ptrName)
      Creates a PTR record.
      static DNSResourceRecord DNSResourceRecord.soa​(java.lang.String name, int ttl, java.lang.String mname, java.lang.String rname, int serial, int refresh, int retry, int expire, int minimum)
      Creates an SOA record.
      static DNSResourceRecord DNSResourceRecord.txt​(java.lang.String name, int ttl, java.lang.String text)
      Creates a TXT record.

      Looks up cached records for a question.
